page.title: 19MEDIA.CALCOT,READING
page.content: Peoples tastes are changing all the time as developments are made in media provision.After the last World War most people listened to the radio,or wireless as some called it.Very few people now listen to the radio on the regular basis they once did. Today,the majority of homes have at least one television set,and some have more.Most people will spend some of their time during the week viewing and some will spend a lot! As videos become more widespread, they are being used increasingly to allow people greater freedom and choice.They can be set to record a favourite programme whilst the owner is out at some other activity.On return he or she may watch it at their leisure. Most homes take a daily paper.Many take comics for the children.
